import requests

url = "https://novelhall-webonvel.p.rapidapi.com/novel/3As-An-Undead-Wizard-I-Summon-SSSlevel-Undead-Disaster-31254/13551963"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "novelhall-webonvel.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests
